text:
/file=./

Need to create template for microservice that should work as reverse-proxy requirements:
- nodejs LTS 
- express
- typescript strict mode
- jest for unit tests
- eslint
- prettier
- husky for pre-commit hooks
- layered architecture
# Node.js Reverse Proxy Microservice Template

I'll create a template for a Node.js reverse proxy microservice using the latest LTS version, following a layered architecture with TypeScript in strict mode.

## Project Structure

```
reverse-proxy-service/
├── .eslintrc.js
├── .prettierrc
├── .gitignore
├── jest.config.js
├── package.json
├── tsconfig.json
├── .husky/
│   └── pre-commit
├── src/
│   ├── index.ts
│   ├── app.ts
│   ├── config/
│   │   └── index.ts
│   ├── presentation/
│   │   ├── controllers/
│   │   │   └── proxy
